entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
